00026 void testEunetTerminal() {
00027         ns3::ObjectFactory object_factory;
00028 
00029         object_factory.SetTypeId("ns3::Node");
00030         //ns3::Ptr<ns3::Node> ptr_node (object_factory.Create<ns3::Node>());
00031         ns3::Ptr<ns3::Node> ptr_node(object_factory.Create<ns3::Node> ());
00032 
00033         ns3::InternetStackHelper internet_stack_helper;
00034         internet_stack_helper.Install(ptr_node);
00035 
00036         object_factory.SetTypeId("CsmaNode");
00037         ns3::Ptr<CsmaNode> ptr_csma_node(object_factory.Create<CsmaNode> ());
00038         internet_stack_helper.Install(ptr_csma_node);
00039         NS_ASSERT(ptr_csma_node->GetNDevices() == 1);
00040 
00041         object_factory.SetTypeId("EunetTerminal");
00042         ns3::Ptr<EunetTerminal> ptr_eunet_terminal(object_factory.Create<
00043                         EunetTerminal> ());
00044         NS_ASSERT(ptr_eunet_terminal->GetNDevices() == 1);
00045 
00046         ns3::Ptr<EunetTerminal> ptr_eunet_terminal_2(object_factory.Create<
00047                         EunetTerminal> ());
00048         NS_ASSERT(ptr_eunet_terminal_2->GetNDevices() == 1);
00049 
00050         ns3::ObjectFactory object_factory_2;
00051         object_factory_2.SetTypeId("EunetTerminal");
00052         ns3::Ptr<EunetTerminal> ptr_eunet_terminal_3(object_factory_2.Create<
00053                         EunetTerminal> ());
00054         NS_ASSERT(ptr_eunet_terminal_3->GetNDevices() == 1);
00055 
00056         NS_LOG_INFO("Run Simulation.");
00057         ns3::Simulator::Stop(ns3::Seconds(0.1));
00058         ns3::Simulator::Run();
00059         ns3::Simulator::Destroy();
00060         NS_LOG_INFO("Done.");
00061 }

00063 void testEunetTerminals() {
00064         EunetTerminals eunet_terminals(3);
00065         eunet_terminals.bringAtoB(1, 0);
00066         eunet_terminals.bringAtoB(2, 0);
00067         eunet_terminals.assignAddresses();
00068         eunet_terminals.setRemoteOfAtoB(0, 0);
00069         eunet_terminals.setRemoteOfAtoB(1, 0);
00070         eunet_terminals.setRemoteOfAtoB(2, 0);
00071         NS_LOG_INFO("Run Simulation.");
00072         ns3::Simulator::Stop(ns3::Seconds(0.1));
00073         ns3::Simulator::Run();
00074         ns3::Simulator::Destroy();
00075         NS_LOG_INFO("Done.");
00076 }
00077 
00078 void testEunetSwitch() {
00079         ns3::ObjectFactory object_factory;
00080         object_factory.SetTypeId("EunetSwitch");
00081         ns3::Ptr<EunetSwitch> eunet_switch(object_factory.Create<EunetSwitch> ());
00082         eunet_switch->getTerminals().assignAddresses();
00083         eunet_switch->getTerminals().setRemoteOfAtoB(0, 0);
00084         eunet_switch->getTerminals().setRemoteOfAtoB(1, 0);
00085         eunet_switch->getTerminals().Get(1)->startAt(ns3::Seconds(0.0));
00086         NS_LOG_INFO("Run Simulation.");
00087         ns3::Simulator::Stop(ns3::Seconds(0.1));
00088         ns3::Simulator::Run();
00089         ns3::Simulator::Destroy();
00090         NS_LOG_INFO("Done.");
00091         eunet_switch->getTerminals().logTotalRx();
00092 }
00093 
00094 void testEunetSwitches() {
00095         EunetSwitches eunet_switches(3, 2);
00096         auto source_switch = eunet_switches.getEunetSwitch(2, 3);
00097         auto source_terminal = source_switch->getTerminal(5);
00098         auto dest_switch = eunet_switches.getEunetSwitch(0, 0);
00099         auto dest_terminal = dest_switch->getTerminal(5);
00100         source_terminal->setRemote(dest_terminal);
00101         source_terminal->startAt(ns3::Seconds(0.0));
00102         source_switch->enableAsciiTraceDownlink(5);
00103         source_switch->enablePcapDownlink(5);
00104         dest_switch->enableAsciiTraceDownlink(5);
00105         dest_switch->enablePcapDownlink(5);
00106         //ns3::CsmaHelper csma_helper;
00107         //csma_helper.EnableAsciiAll("a");
00108         NS_LOG_INFO("Run Simulation.");
00109         ns3::Simulator::Stop(ns3::Seconds(0.1));
00110         ns3::Simulator::Run();
00111         ns3::Simulator::Destroy();
00112         NS_LOG_INFO("Done.");
00113         source_terminal->logTotalRx();
00114         dest_terminal->logTotalRx();
00115 }

00117 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00118         //LogComponentEnable ("EunetSwitchTest", LOG_LEVEL_INFO);
00119         ns3::CommandLine command_line;
00120         std::string test;
00121         command_line.AddValue("scenario", "name of test scenario", test);
00122         command_line.Parse(argc, argv);
00123         if (test == "EunetSwitches") {
00124                 testEunetSwitches();
00125         } else {
00126                 NS_LOG_UNCOND("");
00127                 NS_LOG_UNCOND("Usage:");
00128                 NS_LOG_UNCOND(" EunetSwitchTest --scenario=<ScenarioName>");
00129                 NS_LOG_UNCOND("");
00130                 NS_LOG_UNCOND("Scenario name:");
00131                 NS_LOG_UNCOND(
00132                                 " testEunetSwitches: sample scenario for EunetSwitches class");
00133                 NS_LOG_UNCOND("");
00134         }
00135         return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00136 }//main
